item.title: BOE Considers Ending Corporate Bond Sales Program
item.description: BOE Considers Ending Corporate Bond Sales Program The Bank of England (BOE) is considering ending its active corporate bond sales program as soon as next month. The program was launched in 2020 to help businesses finance their operations during the COVID-19 pandemic.
